alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GULF AND WESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/... At 1243 PM EDT/1143 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Apalachicola, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Buck Siding, Morgan Place, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, Tilton, Beverly, Green Point, White City, Bay City, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Apalachicola Airport, Creels, Hays Place, and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
